text: @realDonaldTrump You are really dumb! No evidence of voter fraud especially from mail voting. You just want Republican states to be allowed to vote by mail so you can attempt to have Covid-19 kill minorities, people of color, the poor, and other groups who aren't drinking your koolaid!
